0000111100101100 0110001010011011 0 -> sum: 0111000111000111, cout: 0
0110100100000101 0111011111100111 0 -> sum: 1110000011101100, cout: 0
1001111110111111 1010010000011101 0 -> sum: 0100001111011100, cout: 1
0011011111000011 0011110100010111 0 -> sum: 0111010011011010, cout: 0
0100111111100110 0011000100010110 1 -> sum: 1000000011111101, cout: 0
1101011111111011 1001010111000111 0 -> sum: 0110110111000010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
